rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with ramp and wide doorways; includes coat closet.
Central area for daily activities, Mediterranean style furniture, large windows for natural light.
Open kitchen layout adjacent to dining area with wheelchair accessible work counters; designed in Mediterranean aesthetic with stone countertops.
Dedicated home office space featuring ergonomic design and ample natural light for productive work environment; designed to be wheelchair accessible.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and adjustable fixtures.

openings.name: Window to Living Room
openings.description: Large window for natural light and ventilation.
